body: @fmassa if you imagine having indices to Embedding as 1-hot encoded matrix we'd actually want to compute the grad weight as `sparse_input * dense_grad = sparse_grad_weight` (transpose omitted for clarity). It's much more efficient, because the input is **extremely** sparse (`grad_weight` has only at most the batch size non-zero rows, out of possibly thousands).
